# Pull Request Template

Thank you for your contribution! For onboarding and setup PRs (Issue #27), please follow this template.

## Description
- Brief description of the change.

## Checklist
- [ ] I have claimed the corresponding issue before working on it.
- [ ] This PR contains only the `contributors/<roll>.txt` file for onboarding (if applicable).
- [ ] I have included a screenshot showing PixDash in Unity Hub with the Unity version visible.

Attach screenshot (or include image link):
